author: wrowe
msg: Ok ... .mak files are nasty.  Here's a bit to clean up -some- of that
nastyness - the absolute paths that .dsp dependencies off of parent
directories are encoded with.  This chops cd "\checkout\httpd-2.0" from
the support directory down to cd "..", a much nicer solution.

author: wrowe
msg: Whoops ... if I'm enabling mod_info to build on Win32, better clean
up the declarations of these private core symbols.

author: wrowe
msg: A little transformation for rbb's reorg of this morning.

author: wrowe
msg: Pay no attention to the man behind the curtain.

author: wrowe
msg: Bring in the expat.lib into the static aprutil.lib win32 library.
Fix up the build order that messed up command-line builds due to
the recent dependency of apr-util on expat-lite.
